quoted.text:
Every startup building an app has to face the question of "should I build my app for iOS or Android first?" 

They often end up making the painful decision of only choosing one (i.e. iOS). But thanks to Codex, we're now getting closer and closer to a world where you can _just do both_.

We're seeing this trend start internally already: where our team used Codex to ship the Android Sora app in record time (as a fast follow after the iOS app): https://t.co/DwFu9tl2HW
